# French and English Second Language Training
### Request for Standing Offer for Professional Services (RFSO)

#### Solicitation Number 
WS4257747730

#### Amendment Number
5

#### Publication Date
October 16, 2023

#### Closing Time
November 27, 2023 | 14:00 EST

#### Location
National Capital Region (NCR)

This solicitation is a request for a standing offer to provide Professional Services in French and English as a Second Language Training to employees in the National Capital Region. The training will enable employees to develop their language skills and improve communication in both languages.

#### Description
The main objective of the requirement is to provide employees with the necessary skills to effectively communicate in both official languages (French and English). The training will be designed to meet the unique needs of the department and will be delivered by experienced instructors.

#### Evaluation Criteria
Respondents will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

#### Trade Agreements 
This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
